April 27 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:: *AVEVA GROUP PLC - TRADING UPDATE *AVEVA - ON A STANDALONE ORGANIC CONSTANT CURRENCY BASIS, ACHIEVED DOUBLE DIGIT REVENUE GROWTH DURING SECOND HALF OF YEAR *AVEVA - THIS RESULTED IN FULL YEAR REVENUE BEING FLAT YEAR-ON-YEAR, ON SAME BASIS, REFLECTING DISRUPTION RELATED TO COVID-19 CRISIS DURING FIRST HALF


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 27-APR-202106:00:05 GMT
